takings.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the money that a business, shop etc gets from selling its goods over a particular period of time
takings.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the money that a business such as a shop or bank gets from selling its goods or services in a particular period of time
takings.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: This shop’s takings are down by half, compared to this time last year.
